artist: Engraver: Jacob Matham; after Hendrick Goltzius
inscription:
Upper center, to the left of figure's head, in image: Ver. |  Lower left, in the image: Iacobus Mathamius. / Goltziy priuignus. / Sculp. | Lower left, to left of figure's left foot, in the image [H Goltzius Inuent. et / excud. 1589.] | Below foot, in the image [1]
inscribed in plate around circumference: Vere reflorescens vestitur frondibus arbor. Vestitur tellus versicolore coma. Concenturque auium, resonat nemus omne. Ariesque Mitior aurato vellere tingit humum. F. Estius
provenance: Private collection, United States; (Childs Gallery, Boston); sold to MIA, 2007.
title: Allegory of Spring
